item.description:
The meeting place might be a little tricky, let's try on the left side of the stage (if you are facing the stage) at 2:15 PM Laszlo Gardony Trio is starting his set at 2:30

SAT, June 13, 12 noon ? 6 PM, Rain or Shine!

CAMBRIDGE RIVER FESTIVAL
A FREE one-day celebration of the arts along the banks of the Charles River â€” featuring jazz, folk, Latin and world music performances, dance, art demonstrations, family art-making activities and over 100 specialty food purveyors and craftspeople!

Where: along Memorial Drive between JFK St. and Western Ave.

www.cambridgeartscouncil.org

617-349-4380
